title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP lets the guys air some grievances - what are they taking issue with these days? The Mastermind behind the Freezing Cold Takes Twitter account, Fred Segal, shares his Mt. Rushmore of Sports Media Bad Hot Takes.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
